1610395383_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEa.body:
> [quantumkitty](#comment_532_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEaQbNZu): There's always going to be people out there who want to tell others how to live their lives. [...]

This ‚òù

Wars, dictatorships, kingdoms, etc have been the norm throughout most of our history. A free society has never been the "normal" state of affairs. Living in a free society is something that we have to fight for, it's not a "right", it's a privilege that we must defend if we wish to continue enjoying it.

It is up to each one of us to decide whether to fight for freedom or surrender and live under tyranny.

Like Emiliano Zapata said (although I don't necessarily agree with his political views):
"Prefiero morir de pie que vivir de rodillas"
